mapper.select: select a.id id, a.role_name roleName from tb_role a,tb_user_role b where a.id = b.role_id and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.status=0
mapper.insert: insert into tb_role (id, role_name, status, created_id, created_date, modified_id, modified_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tb_role
id,
role_name,
status,
created_id,
created_date,
modified_id,
modified_date,
#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createdId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifiedId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update tb_role
role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_id = #{createdId,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_id = #{modifiedId,jdbcType=CHAR},
modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tb_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_id = #{createdId,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_id = #{modifiedId,jdbcType=CHAR}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
